title: HELP!! PLZ LOOK HERE!!
body:
When I bought the team icon, the tier 2 and tier will come to my account right?? You can see I have edg icon for tier 2 and 3 which I've gotten but there was not the skt icon for tier 2 and tier 3...Please check the screenshot and HELP. THANKSSSS!
https://gyazo.com/2f91755642e17ccf01ef156af7e76611 
https://gyazo.com/d9083fd8420a65ffbfc819ad7e46624b

replies.body: This is part of a bug that allowed some players to grab an icon, but because it didn't charge them, it didn't add the crafting materials for tier 2+. You can reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like assistance with this, but note that the end of the event is on Nov. 6th.

I paid for the icons but still can not see the tier2+...and this case just for the skt icon. Looks so wired. And I have uploaded a request but no body helps there..Here is the link:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/23966274
Hopefully somebody can help soon, I don't want to feel disappointed...Thanks.

It's too late, LCS are over...

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
